titleInfo.title: Certificate of Membership of C. H. Ryan, Dark Tobacco Growers Cooperative Association

mods.note: This certificate makes official that C. H. Ryan of Montgomery County, Tennessee has become a member of the Dark Tobacco Growers Cooperative Association. It has been signed by Bradshaw, President, and Still, secretary. Interesting text states that he is "doing his share to abolish speculation and waste and to stabilize the tobacco markets in the interest of the growers of tobacco and for the betterment of his County and his State."
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
